page.title: 06SPORTS CLUBS
page.content: In Ampthill there are many sports clubs.There are six clubs;{netball, {football, cricket, rugby, snooker and {tennis}.All of them can be joined by the public.The netball club is by the Nottingham rooms Woburn Road.You can join at all ages.The football club is in Woburn Road.It is a mens team only. It is not a full size field, and there is only one pitch.The cricket club is in Woburn Road.It accepts children from 12 years old up to mens team.It started in 1962.The rugby club is in Woburn Road.The club starts at under 8 years to the mens team.The tennis club is also in Woburn Road,in the park near the swings and slides. The snooker club is in Bedford Road Ampthill. All of the snooker tables are full size.
